name: pagespeedonline
title: PageSpeed Insights API
description: Analyzes the performance of a web page and provides tailored suggestions to make that page faster.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

fields.name: format
fields.desc: A localized format string with {{FOO}} placeholders, where 'FOO' is the key of the argument whose value should be substituted. For HYPERLINK arguments, the format string will instead contain {{BEGIN_FOO}} and {{END_FOO}} for the argument with key 'FOO'.

fields.name: args
fields.desc: List of arguments for the format string.

fields.name: key
fields.desc: The placeholder key for this arg, as a string.

fields.name: rects
fields.desc: The screen rectangles being referred to, with dimensions measured in CSS pixels. This is only ever used for SNAPSHOT_RECT arguments. If this is absent for a SNAPSHOT_RECT argument, it means that that argument refers to the entire snapshot.

fields.name: top
fields.desc: The top coordinate of the rect, in page coordinates.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width of the rect.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The height of the rect.

fields.name: left
fields.desc: The left coordinate of the rect, in page coordinates.

fields.name: secondary_rects
fields.desc: Secondary screen rectangles being referred to, with dimensions measured in CSS pixels. This is only ever used for SNAPSHOT_RECT arguments.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The height of the rect.

fields.name: left
fields.desc: The left coordinate of the rect, in page coordinates.

fields.name: top
fields.desc: The top coordinate of the rect, in page coordinates.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width of the rect.

fields.name: type
fields.desc: Type of argument. One of URL, STRING_LITERAL, INT_LITERAL, BYTES, DURATION, VERBATIM_STRING, PERCENTAGE, HYPERLINK, or SNAPSHOT_RECT.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: Argument value, as a localized string.

fields.name: data
fields.desc: Image data base64 encoded.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: Height of screenshot in pixels.

fields.name: key
fields.desc: Unique string key, if any, identifying this image.

fields.name: mime_type
fields.desc: Mime type of image data (e.g. "image/jpeg").

fields.name: page_rect
fields.desc: The region of the page that is captured by this image, with dimensions measured in CSS pixels.

fields.name: height
fields.desc: The height of the rect.

fields.name: left
fields.desc: The left coordinate of the rect, in page coordinates.

fields.name: top
fields.desc: The top coordinate of the rect, in page coordinates.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: The width of the rect.

fields.name: width
fields.desc: Width of screenshot in pixels.

fields.name: version
fields.desc: The version of PageSpeed used to generate these results.

fields.name: major
fields.desc: The major version number of PageSpeed used to generate these results.

fields.name: minor
fields.desc: The minor version number of PageSpeed used to generate these results.

fields.name: formattedResults
fields.desc: Localized PageSpeed results. Contains a ruleResults entry for each PageSpeed rule instantiated and run by the server.

fields.name: locale
fields.desc: The locale of the formattedResults, e.g. "en_US".

fields.name: ruleResults
fields.desc: Dictionary of formatted rule results, with one entry for each PageSpeed rule instantiated and run by the server.

fields.name: localizedRuleName
fields.desc: Localized name of the rule, intended for presentation to a user.

fields.name: ruleImpact
fields.desc: The impact (unbounded floating point value) that implementing the suggestions for this rule would have on making the page faster. Impact is comparable between rules to determine which rule's suggestions would have a higher or lower impact on making a page faster. For instance, if enabling compression would save 1MB, while optimizing images would save 500kB, the enable compression rule would have 2x the impact of the image optimization rule, all other things being equal.

fields.name: summary
fields.desc: A brief summary description for the rule, indicating at a high level what should be done to follow the rule and what benefit can be gained by doing so.

fields.name: urlBlocks
fields.desc: List of blocks of URLs. Each block may contain a heading and a list of URLs. Each URL may optionally include additional details.

fields.name: header
fields.desc: Heading to be displayed with the list of URLs.

fields.name: urls
fields.desc: List of entries that provide information about URLs in the url block. Optional.

fields.name: details
fields.desc: List of entries that provide additional details about a single URL. Optional.

fields.name: result
fields.desc: A format string that gives information about the URL, and a list of arguments for that format string.

fields.name: groups
fields.desc: List of rule groups that this rule belongs to. Each entry in the list is one of "SPEED" or "USABILITY".

fields.name: id
fields.desc: Canonicalized and final URL for the document, after following page redirects (if any).

fields.name: invalidRules
fields.desc: List of rules that were specified in the request, but which the server did not know how to instantiate.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Kind of result.

fields.name: pageStats
fields.desc: Summary statistics for the page, such as number of JavaScript bytes, number of HTML bytes, etc.

fields.name: javascriptResponseBytes
fields.desc: Number of uncompressed response bytes for JS resources on the page.

fields.name: numberResources
fields.desc: Number of HTTP resources loaded by the page.

fields.name: numberStaticResources
fields.desc: Number of static (i.e. cacheable) resources on the page.

fields.name: textResponseBytes
fields.desc: Number of uncompressed response bytes for text resources not covered by other statistics (i.e non-HTML, non-script, non-CSS resources) on the page.

fields.name: totalRequestBytes
fields.desc: Total size of all request bytes sent by the page.

fields.name: cssResponseBytes
fields.desc: Number of uncompressed response bytes for CSS resources on the page.

fields.name: flashResponseBytes
fields.desc: Number of response bytes for flash resources on the page.

fields.name: htmlResponseBytes
fields.desc: Number of uncompressed response bytes for the main HTML document and all iframes on the page.

fields.name: numberJsResources
fields.desc: Number of JavaScript resources referenced by the page.

fields.name: otherResponseBytes
fields.desc: Number of response bytes for other resources on the page.

fields.name: imageResponseBytes
fields.desc: Number of response bytes for image resources on the page.

fields.name: numberCssResources
fields.desc: Number of CSS resources referenced by the page.

fields.name: numberHosts
fields.desc: Number of unique hosts referenced by the page.

fields.name: ruleGroups
fields.desc: A map with one entry for each rule group in these results.

fields.name: score
fields.desc: The score (0-100) for this rule group, which indicates how much better a page could be in that category (e.g. how much faster, or how much more usable). A high score indicates little room for improvement, while a lower score indicates more room for improvement.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: Title of the page, as displayed in the browser's title bar.

fields.name: responseCode
fields.desc: Response code for the document. 200 indicates a normal page load. 4xx/5xx indicates an error.

fields.name: screenshot
fields.desc: Base64-encoded screenshot of the page that was analyzed.

methods.name: runpagespeed
methods.desc: Runs PageSpeed analysis on the page at the specified URL, and returns PageSpeed scores, a list of suggestions to make that page faster, and other information.

requiredQueryParams.name: url
requiredQueryParams.desc: The URL to fetch and analyze

optinalQueryParams.name: screenshot
optinalQueryParams.desc: Indicates if binary data containing a screenshot should be included

enum.name: desktop
enum.desc: Fetch and analyze the URL for desktop browsers

enum.name: mobile
enum.desc: Fetch and analyze the URL for mobile devices

optinalQueryParams.name: filter_third_party_resources
optinalQueryParams.desc: Indicates if third party resources should be filtered out before PageSpeed analysis.

optinalQueryParams.name: locale
optinalQueryParams.desc: The locale used to localize formatted results

optinalQueryParams.name: rule
optinalQueryParams.desc: A PageSpeed rule to run; if none are given, all rules are run
